update bbt_entrust set User_Id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, New_User_Id = #{newUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Finally_User_Id = #{finallyUserId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Insurance_Company_Name = #{insuranceCompanyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Insurance_Company_Id = #{insuranceCompanyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, license_Plate_Number = #{licensePlateNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Entrust_Car_Brand = #{entrustCarBrand,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Entrust_Address = #{entrustAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Entrust_Remark = #{entrustRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Entrust_Grade = #{entrustGrade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Entrust_Start_Time = #{entrustStartTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Entrust_End_Time = #{entrustEndTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Car_Type_Id = #{carTypeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Amount_Range_Id = #{amountRangeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Entrust_State = #{entrustState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Entrust_Insure = #{entrustInsure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Entrust_Grade_Time = #{entrustGradeTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Entrust_Service_Charge = #{entrustServiceCharge,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Entrust_Money = #{entrustMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Entrust_Return_Money = #{entrustReturnMoney,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, Entrust_Return_Time = #{entrustReturnTime,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Entrust_Business = #{entrustBusiness,jdbcType=INTEGER}, Entrust_Time = #{entrustTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Entrust_Id = #{entrustId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into bbt_entrust(User_Id, Insurance_Company_Name, Insurance_Company_Id, license_Plate_Number, Entrust_Car_Brand, Entrust_Address, Entrust_Remark, Entrust_Start_Time, Entrust_End_Time, Car_Type_Id, Amount_Range_Id, Entrust_Insure, Entrust_Service_Charge, Entrust_Money, Entrust_Return_Money, Entrust_Return_Time, Entrust_Business)values (#{userId},#{insuranceCompanyName},#{insuranceCompanyId},#{licensePlateNumber},#{entrustCarBrand},#{entrustAddress},#{entrustRemark},#{entrustStartTime},#{entrustEndTime},#{carTypeId},#{amountRangeId},#{entrustInsure},#{entrustServiceCharge},#{entrustMoney},#{entrustReturnMoney},#{entrustReturnTime},#{entrustBusiness})
mapper.select: select count(1) from bbt_entrust where User_Id=#{userId} and Entrust_State=0

SELECT e.Entrust_Id,e.Entrust_Address,e.Entrust_Start_Time,e.Entrust_End_Time,e.Insurance_Company_Id,ic.Insurance_Company_Name,e.Entrust_State,e.Entrust_Money,e.Entrust_Return_Money,e.New_User_Id FROM bbt_entrust e LEFT JOIN bbt_insurance_company ic ON e.Insurance_Company_Id=ic.Insurance_Company_Id WHERE e.User_Id=#{userId} AND e.Entrust_State=0 ORDER BY e.Entrust_Start_Time LIMIT #{state},#{end}

SELECT e.license_Plate_Number,e.Entrust_Id,u.User_Phone,u.User_Name,u.Insurance_Company_Name,u.User_Id FROM bbt_user u LEFT JOIN bbt_entrust e ON u.User_Id <> e.New_User_Id OR u.User_Id = e.New_User_Id where INSTR((SELECT New_User_Id FROM bbt_entrust where Entrust_Id=#{entrustId} and User_Id=#{userId}),u.User_Id)
mapper.update:
UPDATE bbt_entrust
Finally_User_Id=#{finallyUserId},
Entrust_State=1
WHERE Entrust_Id=#{entrustId} and User_Id=#{userId}

UPDATE bbt_user SET Intention_state=0 where INSTR((SELECT New_User_Id FROM bbt_entrust WHERE Entrust_Id=#{entrustId} and User_Id=#{userId}),User_Id) and User_Id != (SELECT Finally_User_Id FROM bbt_entrust WHERE Entrust_Id=#{entrustId} and User_Id=#{userId})
mapper.insert: insert into bbt_friend(user_id, friend_user_id, friend_name, friend_phone, friend_company_name) values (#{userId},#{finallyUserId},#{friendName},#{friendPhone},#{insuranceCompanyName}),(#{finallyUserId},#{userId},#{userName},#{userPhone},#{userInsuranceCompanyName})
insert into bbt_order (User_Id, Finally_User_Id, Entrust_Id) values (#{userId},#{finallyUserId},#{entrustId})
mapper.select: select * from bbt_entrust where User_Id=#{userId} order by Entrust_Start_Time desc
SELECT e.* FROM bbt_entrust e LEFT JOIN bbt_order o ON e.Finally_User_Id=o.Finally_User_Id where o.Finally_User_Id=#{userId} ORDER BY e.Entrust_Grade_Time DESC
select New_User_Id from bbt_entrust where Entrust_Id=#{entrustId}
